column3: Latest;Preah Vihear:------ At around 2:20 pm on May 31
column5: a dead man’s body was found hanging in Rovieng district
column6: Preah Vihear province.------According to the witness
column8: who lived in the commune of Choeung Torn village
column9: said he went to fish in the forest of O’Chanchanan
column10: about six kilometers (6 km) away from the village
column12: which he reported to the police.------After being informed
column13: the cops immediately checked out the scene and the dead body was identified as a suspect who was accused of murdering his wife on April 28
